H0.text: Which craft involves using knots and hitches to make textiles. Weaving

H1.text: Which craft involves using knots and hitches to make textiles. Embroidery

H2.text: Which craft involves using knots and hitches to make textiles. Knitting

H3.text: Which craft involves using knots and hitches to make textiles. Macram

A4.text: Macramé is a form of textile produced using knotting (rather than weaving) techniques.

A5.text: Macramé is a form of textile produced using knotting (rather than knitting) techniques.
